attributes.title: do NOT download!
attributes.review: This app broke my phone!! as soon as i downloaded it, my family was immediately killed and my house was robbed of everything valuable. This app ruined my life!! Please do not download, you will be cursed!!!

attributes.title: ONE STAR. WORSTT APP!!
attributes.review: so one time i flew to the clouds to get a vanilla shake and trump was serving it to me. he first gave me chocolate, then vanilla WITH sprinkles!! then after that he gave me a cat and took my vacuum cleaner, and a “its a girl” balloon. idk how im feeling abt it. just because i didnt download this app he stole my precious belongings. ONE STAR. SHAME ON U AND UR SERVICE FOR THE ICECREAM STOR

attributes.title: Nasty oranges
attributes.review:
Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted! Disgusted!
I downloaded the app to help me learn how to take care of my orange tree but the oranges turned a nasty poo color any way my dogs liked it as a pee spot so at least my dogs are okay but the rats are ANGRY!!! THE RATS WANTED TO COOK WITH THE ORANGES BUT NOW THEY CANT🤬 horrible advice given by the app😡

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review:
I was a girl in the village doing alright
Then I became a princess overnight
Now I gotta figure out how to do it right
So much to learn and see
Up in the castle with my new family
In a school that's just for royalty
A whole enchanted world is waiting for me
I'm so excited to be (Sofia the First)
I'm finding out what being royal's all about (Sofia the First)
Making my way, it's an adventure every day (Sofia)
It's gonna be my time (Sofia)
To show them all that I'm Sofia the First

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: Wow! This is such crap! Who knew this piece of crap app existed! 🤦🏼‍♀️ Don’t download it. Don’t leave a bad review. That would be horrible for this crap app to see a 1 star review. 🤢 This app promotes fascism and I’m not really into that because I’m an American. So thank you NEXT🙄.

attributes.title: Worse app ever
attributes.review: This app is so bad it made me go bald because of the vibrations it sends. It also made my phone shut off completely I had to get a new phone😡. I do not recommend at all

attributes.title: TRASH!
attributes.review: This app runs super slow! And if it’s running Ok then it glitches and doesn’t work anyway. It constantly crashes and it even froze my phone a few times. Trash!

attributes.title: Cheeto let us down😡😤
attributes.review: i am very disappointed! this app works very slow, and is low quality! i thought i would get something good out of this man, but i stand corrected! not impressed

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: After I downloaded it, it started to make my phone smell like bad old man breath. It also will sometimes reek of poo. I’ve been in public and I’m always stared at because people are smelling me. But it isn’t me!! It’s this app!

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: This app was SUPER poorly made. Glitching up a storm in my phone. Apple may as well just delete it. It’s not even set up for user friendly either. Our president can’t even make an app correctly?? A shame.
